title._content: Image taken from page 427 of 'Summerland Sketches; or, rambles in the backwoods of Mexico and Central America. ... With ... illustrations by H. F. Farny and H. Faber'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Summerland Sketches; or, rambles in the backwoods of Mexico and Central America. ... With ... illustrations by H. F. Farny and H. Faber" Author: OSWALD, Felix Leopold. Contributor: FABER, Hermann - Artist Contributor: FARNY, Henry François. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10481.ee.10." Page: 427 Place of Publishing: xxu Date of Publishing: 1880 Publisher: J. B. Lippincott & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002729094 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
